comment.author: 35034346184@N01
comment._content: Hobey Baker. www.hobeybaker.com/ en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hobey_Baker Hobart Amory Hare Baker (January 15, 1892 – December 21, 1918), known as Hobey Baker, was a noted American amateur athlete of the early 20th century. He was the only member of both the College Football Hall of Fame and Hockey Hall of Fame, and U.S. college hockey's annual award for most outstanding player is named in his honor.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Edward Vielmetti: Thanks for providing us with Baker's full name.  We'll include it and the date on the negative next time we update.
